definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 離線手寫簽名鑑別的主要困難在於簽名特徵的提取。

sentences.english: Taxi fares are chargeable by offline credit card via the internet.
sentences.chinese: 的士車費會透過離線方式以信用咭收取。

sentences.english: Syed Akram was 3 years experience in offline and online marketing.
sentences.chinese: 賽義德阿克拉姆是三年離線和在線營銷經驗。

sentences.english: Configure the store for offline payments.
sentences.chinese: 配置商店可以離線支付。

sentences.english: Programming the off-line simulation process and computing the working roll wear in a certain rolling period as scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 編制離線仿真程序，計算某一軋製週期工作輥磨損。

sentences.english: That doesn't mean that offline access to web apps has been perfected.
sentences.chinese: 這並不意味着離線訪問網絡應用程序已經無可挑剔了。

sentences.english: Offline functionality is one of those features.
sentences.chinese: 離線功能就是這樣的要求之一。

sentences.english: Off-line log is non-real time log.
sentences.chinese: 離線日誌是指非實時的日誌信息。

sentences.english: The characters of rail out-line quenching are presented which is achieved at Baotou Steel.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了包鋼新建鋼軌離線全長淬火工藝的特點。

sentences.english: This also allows customizations and reports to be developed off-site.
sentences.chinese: 這也使得定製和報表離線開發成爲可能。

sentences.english: Net society differs from off-line society by welcoming intellectual activity.
sentences.chinese: 網絡社會不同於離線社會，它樂於接受智力活動。

sentences.english: However, between his select and the updates, the table has been reorganized offline.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在他進行選擇到更新期間，表被離線重組。

sentences.english: At this page, both online and offline backup maintenance windows can be set.
sentences.chinese: 在這個頁面上，可以設置在線和離線備份維護時間窗。

sentences.english: By default, Firefox 3 caches 500MB of data from supportedoffline Web apps.
sentences.chinese: 火狐3默認只有500mb的離線緩存。

sentences.english: cit.) as a pessimistic offline lock.
It allows for the application to operate smoothly whether it is online or offline.
sentences.chinese: 它允許應用程序順暢運行，無論在線還是離線。

definition: set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
